body:
Lol what a 'logical' explanation you scumbag of a husband. The wife nodding along and said she said it is alright now made me Lol hahaha. What the affair man said was true and right though: They're a fcked up husband and wife. And "suit yourself" is a the right say in this!
I guess in that is their utopia no matter how fucked up it is. And he did the right thing leaving this or he's gonna go insane hahaha.
you know there's hospitals for this kind of illness minds , get help you fucktard husband .
